+10 [industryColored] per Anomaly on System
Ancient Knowledge Your civilization has already explored the galaxy, now all that is left is to take it. Reveals all Solar Systems in the Galaxy
Well Founded Your civilization has already expended the resources to explore their constellation, but now they can finally explore it. Reveals all Nodes in Starting Constellation
Lost Refuge With an extragalactic knowledge of where all the true landmarks of the galaxy are, finding a place to hide or escape to has never been easier. Reveals all Special Nodes in the Galaxy
Predator Nature instincts make it easy to determine roughly where your prey lay. Reveals all the location of all Home Systems in the Galaxy
May not build Colony Ships May not occupy Conquered Territory
State Administration As a result of its history of decentralized government, this faction is incapable of enforcing much in the way of empire-wide legislation.
Core Administration This faction strives for centralized government and can more easily maintain empire-wide legislation.
Cheats Displays traits that have game-breaking effects #FF0000#+10 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+50 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+100 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+500 Points#REVERT# #FF0000#+1000 Points#REVERT# Someone is a big cheater!
Generate at least $ScienceAmoutName Science for $TurnsAmoutName Turns through any means You can find new Relics or remove Relics from Heroes to increase your Science production, as well as build improvements or enter science agreements with other factions Planets do not generate Science. Cannot obtain Technology from other empires. Leveraged Buyouts Provides buyout cost reduction of 10% Speculative Finance Provides buyout cost reduction of 20% Efficient Contracting Provides buyout cost reduction of 10% Efficient Contracting Provides buyout cost reduction of 10%
Accelerated Colonization +10 [foodColored] on systems (colonies and outposts) Production Quotas +15 [industryColored] on systems (colonies and outposts)
+10 [manpower] on Systems (Vanilla) +15 [manpower] on Systems (Rework) +15 [systemdefense] on Systems (Rework) +400 [systemdefense] Capacity on Systems (Rework)
+40 [systemdefense] Capacity per [population] on Systems (Rework) +3 [manpower] per [population] on Systems (Rework)
+5% [manpower] per System Level on Systems (Vanilla) +40% x GameSpeed [manpower] per System Level on Systems (Rework)
Greener Pastures Your empire knows how to make it's cities look beautiful, and, alongside a good handling of tourism, many tourists end up settling in a more permanent fashion.
AI Civil Labor The sophons know their way with AIs, and this knowledge can be extended to precise civilian everyday tasks, expanding productivity wasted on small but necessary matter. Smarter Cities Advanced techniques building on the already existing improved smart cities allow their urbanized land to produce far more food. Automated Advanced Problem Solving Doing the known but boring complex arithmetic yourself as a Sophon is one the highest forms of boredom existing in the Sophon society (excluding bureaucracy), but through new optimizations in automated problem solving, these tasks become avoidable and allow the Sophons to concentrate on the greater picture. Centralized Bureaucracy It may harsh on some Sophons, but secluding those working in paperwork inside their workplace before they finish their work is a sure way to make sure the work is done well and fast. AI Banking The icing on the cake in term of civilian investing, these new AIs excel at lending funds to promising enterprises, and reduce the risk of failure through added counseling to new ventures. Dust output climbs once again.
Ship Design Rewards Enabling this will allow you to unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. True You will unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests. False You won't unlock other faction's hull designs from certain quests.
--> Poacher Your empire has a.. gift for knowing where feeble empires are located, but who knows you'll do with this information. Reveals all Minor Factions in the Galaxy
